alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Madison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 1:46PM EST until March 05 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Indiana... White River at Muncie. .Brief minor flooding expected along the White River near Muncie. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Muncie. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Some farmlands and county roads flood. Small park near Daleville floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM EST Saturday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 9.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
